segments.text: That's right . And I'm going to be Vice President of Marketing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Way to go , Mary . A lot has happened during the last few months , hasn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's up with Vince and Elvin ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're in awe of her . After they saw how she crushed WebTracker ... but I guess you know all about that .
segments.speaker: S1
